input.sentences: we began our vacation by first visiting the beautiful fountain at town square .
we then traveled to the curvy stairway to see our next historical spot .
arriving at the statue | we took several pictures of the figure .
next | when we went to view the library and statue in front as well .
after a long day of tourism | we headed back to our hotel which is known for its eccentric architecture .
output.sentences: I was visiting my hometown while i was on vacation and decided to pass by the town i grew up in.
I was going through memory lane and traveled to a stairway where i used that spot to go to relax.
Around the corner of the stairway, there was a statues and i decided to take pictures of the figure on top.
As i was wondering around i view a statue in front of the library were i used to studyin in my school year.
I finished my tourism around my town i wanted to go the hotel so i headed towards the front of the entrance of the town.
